Activity.description: An activity is something that occurs over a period of time and acts upon or with entities; it may include consuming, processing, transforming, modifying, relocating, using, or generating entities.

endedAtTime.description: The prov:endedAtTime establishes the relationship between prov:Activity and xsd:DateTime that allows one to specify the time when the activity ended.

startedAtTime.description: The prov:startedAtTime establishes the relationship between prov:Activity and xsd:DateTime that allows one to specify the time when the activity started.

Activity.title: Activity

Agent.description: An agent is something that bears some form of responsibility for an activity taking place, for the existence of an entity, or for another agent's activity.

is_associated_with.description: The brainkb:isAssociatedWith property establishes relationships between different entities: it connects prov:Agent to prov:Activity, reflecting the involvement or connection between an agent and an activity.

Agent.title: Agent

Annotation.description: An annotation is a written explanatory or critical description, or other in-context information (e.g., pattern, motif, link), that has been associated with data or other types of information.
Annotation.title: Annotation

Assertion.description: A statement made by a particular agent on a particular occasion that a particular proposition is true, based on the evaluation of one or more lines of evidence.

hasAssertionCategory.description: The brainkb:hasAssertionCategory property relates brainkb:Evidence and brainkb:Categories, specifying the classification or category that the assertion belongs to.

hasAssertionMethod.description: The brainkb:hasAssertionMethod property relates an eco:Assertion to an brainkb:AssertionMethod that differentiates different types of assertions techniques used while making an assertion.

hasAssertionText.description: The brainkb:hasAssertionText property relates an eco:Assertion to an xsd:string, providing a textual excerpt of the assertion being made.

has_evidence_line.description: A relationship between an assertion or proposition and an evidence line used in evaluating its validity.

Assertion.title: Assertion

AssertionMethod.description: A means by which a statement is made about the entity
AssertionMethod.title: AssertionMethod

AssertionSummary.description: A summary is a brief statement or description of the main points, especially as a conclusion to a work about the assertion.

hasAssertionSummary.description: The brainkb:hasAssertionSummary property relates a brainkb:AssertionSummary to an xsd:string, providing a concise overview that differentiates various assertions. This summary encapsulates the core content of the assertion, allowing for easy identification and understanding of its essence.

is_associated_with.description: The brainkb:isAssociatedWith property establishes relationships between different entities:it links sepio:Assertion to brainkb:AssertionSummary, indicating the association between an assertion and its corresponding summary.

AssertionSummary.title: AssertionSummary

AutomaticAssertion.description: An assertion method that does not involve human review.
AutomaticAssertion.title: AutomaticAssertion

Document.description: A collection of information content entities intended to be understood together as a whole
Document.title: Document

hasEvidenceCategory.description: The brainkb:hasEvidenceCategory property relates brainkb:Evidence and brainkb:Categories, specifying the classification or category that the evidence belongs to.

hasEvidenceText.description: The brainkb:hasEvidenceText property relates an eco:Evidence to an xsd:string, providing a textual excerpt of the evidence supporting the assertion.

EvidenceLine.description: An evidence line represents an independent and meaningful argument for or against a particular proposition, that is based on the interpretation of one or more pieces of information as evidence.

has_contributer.description: A relation between an information content entity and an agent who made a contribution to its information content, or to its subsequent modification or assessment.

EvidenceLine.title: EvidenceLine

EvidenceSummary.description: A summary is a brief statement or description of the main points, especially as a conclusion to a work about the evidence.

hasEvidenceSummary.description: The brainkb:hasEvidenceSummary property relates a brainkb:EvidenceSummary to an xsd:string, providing a concise overview that differentiates various evidence. This summary encapsulates the core content of the evidence, allowing for easy identification and understanding of its essence.

is_associated_with.description: The brainkb:isAssociatedWith property establishes relationships between different entities: it associates eco:Evidence with brainkb:EvidenceSummary, signifying the connection between evidence and its summarized representation.

EvidenceSummary.title: EvidenceSummary

ManualAssertion.description: An assertion method that involves human review.
ManualAssertion.title: ManualAssertion
